RESERVATION_UNIT_IS_NOT_OPEN: The space is closed at the moment.
RESERVATION_UNIT_IN_OPEN_ROUND: You can make a seasonal booking application for this space.
MAX_NUMBER_OF_ACTIVE_RESERVATIONS_EXCEED: You have exceeded the maximum number of reservations.
RESERVATION_UNIT_TYPE_IS_SEASON: You can only make a seasonal booking application for this space.
